医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
大型研究证实闭锁综合征是非致命性儿童溺水的主要后果这与传统观念中的“植物人状态”相去甚远，在“植物人状态”中，思想缺席，而身体却存活。事实上，事实恰恰相反。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Large-study-confirms-locked-in-syndrome-as-the-predominant-outcome-of-non-fatal-pediatric-drowning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Large-study-confirms-locked-in-syndrome-as-the-predominant-outcome-of-non-fatal-pediatric-drowning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e4a3df7-46c7-4c75-9edf-b32f49f23b1d Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:58:00 -0500 Large study confirms locked-in syndrome as the predominant outcome of non-fatal pediatric drowning
华盛顿大学医学院合作改善儿科心脏病护理圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院加入了儿科心脏网络，这是一个由领先医院和研究机构组成的多中心合作组织，致力于改善对儿科心脏病患者的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Washington-University-School-of-Medicine-joins-collaboration-to-improve-pediatric-heart-disease-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Washington-University-School-of-Medicine-joins-collaboration-to-improve-pediatric-heart-disease-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da3cfeaa-acd6-402e-bc65-7a3768731103 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:55:02 -0500 Washington University School of Medicine joins collaboration to improve pediatric heart disease care
临床研究支持伤寒结合疫苗的长期影响马里兰大学医学院 (UMSOM) 疫苗中心的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，单剂伤寒结合疫苗 Typbar TCV 可以持久有效地预防 9 个月至 12 岁儿童的伤寒发展与全球健康 (CVD)，由马拉维-利物浦威康信托 (MLW) 临床研究计划的国内合作伙伴领导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Clinical-study-supports-the-long-having-impacts-of-typhoid-conjugate-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Clinical-study-supports-the-long-having-impacts-of-typhoid-conjugate-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c978977-ce3e-4279-9887-060d260e11f4 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:49:22 -0500 Clinical study supports the long-lasting impacts of typhoid conjugate vaccine
研究人员发现了保护冠状病毒免受免疫系统攻击的“保护开关”超过 7 亿人被感染，近 700 万人死亡，使 SARS-CoV-2 成为 21 世纪最具破坏性的流行病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Researchers-discover-protective-switches-that-shield-the-coronavirus-from-immune-system-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Researchers-discover-protective-switches-that-shield-the-coronavirus-from-immune-system-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32893dbb-9378-4ac7-a2db-56df20f523f8 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:41:25 -0500 Researchers discover "protective switches" that shield the coronavirus from immune system attacks
咖啡因提高电子竞技表现：增强职业玩家的反应和射击技巧研究表明，补充 3 毫克/公斤的咖啡因可显着增强职业电子竞技运动员的认知和射击表现，改善第一人称射击游戏中的反应时间、视觉搜索反应时间和射击准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Caffeine-boosts-eSports-performance-Enhanced-reaction-and-shooting-skills-in-pro-gamers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Caffeine-boosts-eSports-performance-Enhanced-reaction-and-shooting-skills-in-pro-gamers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a291ad7-e425-4b24-835f-4fa00863848d Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:26:00 -0500 Caffeine boosts eSports performance: Enhanced reaction and shooting skills in pro gamers
参议院调查辅助生活费用及其对美国家庭的负担美国参议院委员会周四启动了对辅助生活的审查，举行了二十年来的首次该行业听证会，两党领导人都对长期护理设施的高成本和质量参差不齐表示担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Senate-probes-the-cost-of-assisted-living-and-its-burden-on-American-families.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Senate-probes-the-cost-of-assisted-living-and-its-burden-on-American-families.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3bcf9fb-b5d6-4fd8-a068-ad98ab91dacf Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:24:43 -0500 Senate probes the cost of assisted living and its burden on American families
古代巴西基因组可能蕴藏着密螺旋体进化历史的秘密研究从 2000 年前的巴西遗骸中重建了四个古代密螺旋体基因组，揭示了它们与引起贝耶的梅毒螺旋体的密切关系，并挑战了之前关于密螺旋体亚种适应性的假设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Ancient-Brazilian-genomes-may-hold-the-secrets-of-treponemal-evolutionary-history.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Ancient-Brazilian-genomes-may-hold-the-secrets-of-treponemal-evolutionary-history.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=accf2614-e714-4d0f-a3f9-a5c913f95994 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:07:00 -0500 Ancient Brazilian genomes may hold the secrets of treponemal evolutionary history
冲水前盖上马桶盖是否可以防止病毒污染？ 《美国感染控制杂志》的一项研究表明，冲水前关闭马桶盖并不能显着降低浴室表面污染的风险，这凸显了定期消毒对于防止病原体传播的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Does-fitting-the-toilet-lid-before-flushing-prevent-viral-contamination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Does-fitting-the-toilet-lid-before-flushing-prevent-viral-contamination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ce389e1-3ccc-42c0-bb7f-06ef78d4268c Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:58:00 -0500 Does closing the toilet lid before flushing prevent viral contamination?
植物性饮食如何影响妊娠结局？ 《斯堪的纳维亚妇产学报》的一项研究调查了怀孕期间植物性饮食的影响，结果表明，与杂食或素食饮食相比，纯素饮食与较低的出生体重和较高的先兆子痫风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/How-does-a-plant-based-diet-affect-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/How-does-a-plant-based-diet-affect-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1744435-1e60-4f97-a13a-8588f0afeeed Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:34:00 -0500 How does a plant-based diet affect pregnancy outcomes?
童年逆境可能引发青春期肥胖研究将不良童年经历与青春期肥胖风险增加联系起来，这是由行为问题和自我概念介导的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Childhood-adversity-may-trigger-obesity-in-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Childhood-adversity-may-trigger-obesity-in-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc5aa4ef-6831-4ee3-bf81-6cd4c678b73b Thu, 25 Jan 2024 19:07:00 -0500 Childhood adversity may trigger obesity in adolescence
